resources.string: The U.S. is a country of 50 states covering a vast swath of North America, with Alaska in the northwest and Hawaii extending the nation’s presence into the Pacific Ocean. Major Atlantic Coast cities are New York, a global finance and culture center, and capital Washington, DC. Midwestern metropolis Chicago is known for influential architecture and on the west coast, Los Angeles Hollywood is famed for filmmaking.The U.S. is a country of 50 states covering a vast swath of North America, with Alaska in the northwest and Hawaii extending the nation’s presence into the Pacific Ocean. 1. APPLICATION AND OTHER CONDITIONS RULE - 008/2000 UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED INSTANT PURCHASE ONE WAY ECONOMY CLASS FARE APPLICATION AREA THESE FARES APPLY WITHIN AREA 3. CLASS OF SERVICE THESE FARES APPLY FOR ECONOMY CLASS SERVICE. TYPES OF TRANSPORTATION THIS RULE GOVERNS ONE-WAY FARES. FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE CAN BE USED TO CREATE ONE-WAY/ROUND-TRIP/CIRCLE-TRIP/OPEN-JAW JOURNEYS. 
 
 2. FLIGHT APPLICATION UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED THE FARE COMPONENT MUST BE ON ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING ANY TR FLIGHT. 
 
 3. ADVANCE RES/TICKETING UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED OPEN RETURNS NOT PERMITTED. WAITLIST NOT PERMITTED. TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED WITHIN 24 HOURS AFTER RESERVATIONS ARE MADE OR AT LEAST 4 HOURS BEFORE DEPARTURE WHICHEVER IS EARLIER. NOTE - THE AUTO TICKETING TIME LIMIT APPLIES TO YOUR PNR.FAILURE TO COMPLY WITH THE TICKETING TIME LIMIT WILL RESULT IN CANCELLATION OF THE RESERVATION. OR - RESERVATIONS ARE REQUIRED AT LEAST 4 HOURS BEFORE DEPARTURE. OPEN RETURNS NOT PERMITTED. RESERVATIONS AND TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED AT THE SAME TIME. WAITLIST NOT PERMITTED. NOTE - THE

Jl. HOS Tjokroaminoto No. 41-43 40171 Bandung Java Indonesia, 10250

Hotel Trans Luxury Bandung is in Jakarta\'s business district and offers luxurious accommodations with spacious sitting areas and a marble bathtub. It features a rejuvenating spa and an outdoor hot tub.
To better assist you, please give your booking ID when you contact to our Customer service, Thank you.
Jl. Lengkong Kecil 76-80, Asia Afrika, Arjuna, Bandung, Jawa Barat, Indonesia 42061
